message: I propose dividing the money with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. This allows us both to have a fair share while considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.

I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  While I understand the money is losing value, I think this is a fairer division, considering I'm taking the risk of being left with less in the next round if we don't reach an agreement.
